name: 3 Minutes (treblahy)
description:
You only got 3 minutes to destroy all the enemys and overcome all the difficultys. Time does not wait for you, so you'd better hurry, otherwise...

This is the first time I join Game Jam since I start learning and using Unity, I had a lot of fun, but also not a lot of sleep :P

This is also just the second game I made,  so...I guess it's not going to be too good, at least not masterpiece of course, but I really enjoy learning new things and joining events like this.

Anyways, have fun!
